title: Logo

author: hunny

comments.content:
hi there,   
im new in this and i need to do a logo for a wood works web called woodnet.   
this is what i done, tell me what u think, thanks.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023143549im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/49860.jpg)

hi there,   
im new in this and i need to do a logo for a wood works web called woodnet.   
this is what i done, tell me what u think, thanks.

I like hummingbirds, and I like wood, but I don't see the connection. Do they already have a   
hummingbird in their logo that you are preserving?   
   
Also, you'll get alot more useful suggestions from the folks here if you tell a little about the company.   
For instance, does Woodnet serve wood suppliers or buyers? Raw materials like lumber or finished   
 woodworking pieces?   
   
The dn ligature looks a little more like dh.   
   
Not sure about the font. It doesn't feel very "woody" to me.
please post a GIF file instead.
